tweet: Merry Christmas to you and your family! What a time to reflect on the many blessings God has given us. In the dark of night he offered his son to the world, and in doing so he offered us salvation. I hope you enjoy time with family and friends this Christmas.

I commend the EPA for reworking this rule in a way that sets boundaries on the federal government’s jurisdiction. I trust that states and local property owners can steward their water resources better than bureaucrats in Washington, D.C. https://www.washingtonexaminer.com/policy/energy/trumps-epa-rolls-back-obama-era-puddle-rule …

Congratulations to Matthew Paris, winner of the #CongressionalAppChallenge for the 4th District! Matthew's app, "Home Safe," makes it easier for people to get out of problematic situations. I'm proud of everyone who participated in the #CAC this year. https://www.greeleytribune.com/news/eaton-high-school-student-wins-congressional-app-challenge-for-an-android-app-home-safe/ …

I’m saddened to hear about the passing of former President George HW Bush. His record is one of selfless service to this country, and for that we all thank him. As he and Barbara are now reunited, we keep the rest of his family in our prayers. #41
